Counsel to the Mother of a Strong-willed Child.-- Your child is not your own; you cannot do with her as 
                                                                           310
you like, for she is the property of the Lord. Exercise a steady persevering control over her; teach her that she belongs to God. With such a training she will grow up to be a blessing to those around her. But clear, sharp discernment will be necessary in order that you may repress her inclination to rule you both, to have her own will and way, and to do as she pleases.
